**Instructions:**

1.  **Read the Stewardship Rider:** Before submitting, you must read and fully understand the [Stewardship Rider in the MRSL-1.0](mrsl-1.0.html#part-ii-the-stewardship-rider-an-optional-ethical-use-covenant).
2.  **Complete the Declaration:** Fill in the template below with your information.
3.  **Submit:** Submit this issue. A project maintainer will review it and, upon verification, add your details to the `STEWARD.md` file.

---

### Formal Declaration of Stewardship

By submitting this issue, I, **`[[Your Full Name or Legal Entity Name]]`**, hereby declare that I have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of the Stewardship Rider (Part II) of the MitsuoLabs Reciprocity and Stewardship License, version 1.0, in all my past, present, and future Contributions to any project governed by said license.
